name: Swipe Some Jewel
description:
Just a casual game with 3 hexagonal and 3 squares shape scene where you swipe/drag the jewel and match 3 or more to destroy/eliminate them, so the timer is 120 seconds/2 minutes, also the size in here is 9x9.

Power: Destroy all gem according the stripes goes, like horizontal thing above.

Bomb: Exploding all the gem and regenerated them after that happens.

Rainbow Circle: Drag any gem and you can destroy one colors only.

Special: Destroy any gem with this and you will surprised because it burst a lot like fireworks.

That's all. i hope this will make it fun and challenging to you.

Music by freesound.org and Background is randomly.
